name: Reagent Quays
role_in_state: primary reagent transshipment and provisioning hub
economy_niches: low-scale ritual-lab services for voyage auguries
culture_adjustments: tighter guild secrecy and permit culture than broader state
port cant enriched by visiting Island Creole merchants
ritual packing and reagent-handling rites common among dock crews
higher pragmatic literacy among clerks and foremen
normalization of foreign seasonal labor and cross-clan crews
constraints: strict guild regulations on reagent handling and licensing
limited inland transport capacity for heavy reagents
ritual magic consumption of scarce imported reagents raises storage hazards
notes: critical node for state ritual-magic supply chains
seasonal auguries and sailing windows dictate throughput peaks
licensed handlers required for bonded quays and auctions
